entities.name: ron
entities.description: Hermione's friend who is trying to hold onto Scabbers.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Ron's friend who is whispering urgently and trying to distract Crookshanks.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Someone who Hermione is worried will arrive in a minute.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Ron's pet rat that is trying to break free from Ron's grip.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: A cat who is sneaking towards Scabbers and causing trouble.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Ron's friend who sees Crookshanks approaching and tries to stop Ron from chasing after Scabbers.

relationships.description: Ron is holding onto Scabbers, but the rat manages to slip away.
Ron throws off the Invisibility Cloak and chases after Scabbers.
Harry and Hermione look at each other before following Ron into the darkness.
